product.name: EOS 5
product.description: The Canon EOS 5 is a semi-professional autofocus, autoexposure 35 mm SLR film camera.

product.name: EOS 6
product.description: The Canon EOS 6D is a light, full-frame DSLR, fitted with a 20.2 megapixel CMOS sensor, 11-point AutoFocus system and built-in GPS and Wi-Fi support.

product.name: EOS A2
product.description: Canon EOS-A2 SLR 35mm FILM Camera with Tamron 80-210mm Lens w/Hood, Vertical Grip Here is great package that includes everything you need to start shooting
